name: Logic Machines
description:
Back of Case - Nintendo DS (US) (from Ad Blurbs)

Use your keen sense of logic and the Laws of Physics to solve brain teasing puzzles. Set forth on a quest to become a puzzle master! *screenshot captions)
  • 91 challenging levels of varying difficulty.
  • 15 different parts to utilize from.
  • Two modes of gameplay: Adventure and stimulating Challenge.
